title: Sum List with For Loop
description: Sum the elements of a list using a for loop.
instructions: Run the code to see the sum of the list elements.
starter:
numbers = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
total = 0
for num in numbers:
    total += num
print('Sum:', total)

files./sum_list.py:
numbers = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
total = 0
for num in numbers:
    total += num
print('Sum:', total)
